description.value: When you terrorize your enemies, you also cause them painful mental distress. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] a foe, that foe takes @Damage[1d4[mental]] damage at the start of each of its turns as long as it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] and continues to engage in combat with you. If you have master proficiency in Intimidation, the damage increases to @Damage[2d4[mental]]{2d4}, and if you have legendary proficiency, the damage increases to @Damage[3d4[mental]]{3d4}.
